backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling public application submissions and admin‑restricted retrieval of sorted applications with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, global layout, route definitions, and a safe footer referral link.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button using Internet Identity with login/logout handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/site/HeaderNav.t: Header navigation with logo, public route links, mobile menu, and Apply CTA button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing on identity changes.
Fetches admin‑only application list via actor with most‑recent‑first sorting and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current authenticated caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module reserved for organizing query-related hooks.
Handles submitting application data through the backend actor with loading and error state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for the RICHUAL UI, including colors and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/validation/applyApplica: Validates application form input fields and returns structured errors and validity status.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with themed sections describing the philosophy and system behind RICHUAL.
frontend/src/pages/AdminApplicationsPage: Displays admin-only application listings with authentication, authorization checks, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ApplyPage.tsx: Renders the application form with validation, submission handling, and a success confirmation view.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero imagery, rank previews, and navigation to the application form.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Displays membership benefits and outlines the multi-step application process.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Shows the four-rank program structure with descriptions and focus areas for each level.
Presents core rituals with descriptions and practices, emphasizing the program's philosophical foundation.
frontend/src/utils/routes.ts: Defines public route constants and navigation items for the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, plugins, and global styling settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, known issues, and feature definitions for building and deploying the RICHUAL brand website. Contains schema metadata, stack notes, and a list of implemented or planned site features.
